member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.InteractionMode
member.summary: Represents the valid interaction modes for the C1RiaAdapter when modified data needs to be committed in order to sort, filter or group the C1DataGrid data.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.InteractionMode.Preventive
member.summary: This mode disables the features that are not allowed when there are uncommitted changes.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.InteractionMode.Prompt
member.summary: This mode asks the user to commit changes before it continues to perform operations.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.InteractionMode.None
member.summary: This mode does not provide any special handling for uncommitted changes

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.C1RiaAdapter.InteractionModeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.C1RiaAdapter.DataGridProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.C1RiaAdapter.DataProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.C1RiaAdapter.FilterOperatorProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Ria.C1RiaAdapter.InteractionMode
member.summary: If a set of pending changes exists in the client application, the DomainDataSource will not be able to perform a Load operation, this affects filtering, sorting and grouping. The InteractionMode determines the way the C1RiaAdapter will handle this scenarios. Preventive: the C1RiaAdapter will disable the features that are not allowed while there are pending changes. Prompt: the C1RiaAdapter will ask the user to commit changes before continuing. None: no special handling.
